location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 8 September, and informing that the Governor is satisfied with Mr Henshaw's work in the recovering of the Ahmed Shah's cargo, under the agreement to receive a compensation of 10% on what he might recover.
